attributes.action: Retain the historic figure of Britannia on coinage of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The figure of Britannia has been found on British coins since Roman times and is an integral part of our national identity and culture. The loss of it from our coins is a further erosion of the culture of our nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
